remarks: A commutative law for finite iterated sums.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
statement:
gsumcom3fi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumcom3fi.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsumcom3fi.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
gsumcom3fi.r $e |- ( ph -> C e. Fin ) $.
gsumcom3fi.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. A /\ k e. C ) ) -> X e. B ) $.
gsumcom3fi $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( j e. A |-> ( G gsum ( k e. C |-> X ) ) ) ) = ( G gsum ( k e. C |-> ( G gsum ( j e. A |-> X ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A j k $.
$d B j k $.
$d C j k $.
$d G j k $.
$d j k ph $.
